title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, August 3, 2021
description: "Much of our lives involves the word 'no….But art is the big yes. In art, you get a chance to make something where there was nothing." –Marvin Bell, poet, born 1937.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: "Much of our lives involves the word 'no….But art is the big yes. In art, you get a chance to make something where there was nothing." –Marvin Bell, poet, born 1937.
